data.title: United States V. Gerald Green, Et Al. Court Docket Number: 08-CR-059-GW
data.text:
This case was filed on January 16, 2008, in the Central District of California.

Related Case(s):

United States v Patricia Green: Docket No. 08-CR-059-GW (01/16/08)

Note:

A Criminal Complaint as to Gerald and Patricia Green was filed before Magistrate Judge Margaret A. Nagle on December 7, 2007, in the United States District Court for the Central District of California. The docket number for the Magistrate Judge case is 2:07-mj-02090-DUTY.
